div.div:
Schildkamp - January 3, 2012 - Version 2.13
Best audiobook app ever!!
I've been using this app for more than a year now, and although I've tried others as well, i ALWAYS return to this one. Yes, this is a very specialized player, with a ton of advanced functions, and so you need to spend a few minutes understanding what this app can do for you. However, it quickly pays off, and like I said, in my personal opinion there is no better player around.

KWade - January 18, 2012 - HTC Droid Incredible with version 2.13
My favorite for trips!
This is a great app. I love to listen to books while exercising, working in the yard, or traveling. I've caught up on some classics that I had never read. Easy to use and performs as expected.

David - December 27, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 2.13
Still in Love!
Awesome! I have tried many Audiobook players and this is simply the best there is! Download and enjoy! Update: works great on my Galaxy Nexus (ICS) too!

Paul - January 9, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 2.13
Excellent
Love this player. Had Audiobooks app, didn't work with ICS. I believe this was not a bad deal. So far so good. Galaxy Nexus

Kathleen - November 26, 2011 - Motorola Droid X with version 2.13
Ambling BookPlayer Pro
Love it! Nothing even comes close. Works great on Droid X. Spent hours trying out others. Don't bother! $8.99 is a steal for this user-friendly app.

Nikki - May 20, 2012 - Droid Bionic with version 2.13
I recommend Astro Player Nova instead!
At least until Ambling gets around to adding audio speed control as requested SO many times. I might consider coming back then but I doubt it. Uninstalled.

James - April 2, 2012 - HTC Evo 4G with version 2.13
Simply The Best
I have used this audiobook reader for years and love it. It bookmarks, groups for series and remembers then if you have to delete a book temporarily. Also allotted you to add your own cover art.

Llantha - December 18, 2011 - Version 2.13
Use it daily
Hate new UI Wastes screen space with ads for the product. Uninstall and roll back. Will fix my review when you give me my screen space back!

PT - November 24, 2011 - SEMC Xperia X10 with version 2.13
The software download stalls after 3 seconds & cancels. Every other app on mySE ...
The software download stalls after 3 seconds & cancels. Every other app on mySE Xperia X10i d'loads fine. Annoyed, because i loved the free version.

Helga - May 24, 2012 - Motorola Atrix with version 2.13
Good player.
I've been using this player for two years. I've loved it. But its been a long time since any improvements. I'd like to see it automatically load files instead of the laborious, complicated system it has now. Each file has to be manually loaded into the library. Editing the loaded file names/titles is a great option. A new widget with cover art would be nice too. Make a good player great.

Cheryl - March 9, 2012 - HTC Droid Incredible with version 2.13
Great selections. I've "read" more books in the last year than I have in ...
Great selections. I've "read" more books in the last year than I have in the previous 5 years .

Josh - February 28, 2012 - Motorola Droid X with version 2.13
The best I've tried (I've tried almost all)
I have tried most of the music players that claim to do audiobooks well, and this is far-and-away the best. It does almost anything I ever want to do, and with a well-thought-out and intuitive interface. The automatic bookmark system is especially good; that's a little ironic because, unlike all the others I've tried, this one seems to almost never lose its place, thus making auto bookmarks less necessary. I could see how good it would be from the free app, but the pro was worth the money--for me especially for the sleep timer. (Droid X)

glen - February 11, 2012 - Version 2.13
Great app!
5 stars if we could simply delete more than 1 audio file (multiselect) from an audiobook at a time. It's inconvenient to individually delete two or more files.

Bill - November 28, 2011 - Motorola Atrix with version 2.13
Excellent app, does everything I need
Excellent app, does everything I need for listening to books and podcasts. Remembers my stoping point which is great. Gets better all the time.

Michael - June 20, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Note with version 2.13
Trouble free
Reliable and easy to understand...

minnie - April 17, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 2.13
Brilliant.
I love this app. Unlike others, it keeps the place of last listening. Highly recommend.

1557-IsaacLopez - February 16, 2012 - HTC EVO Shift 4G with version 2.13
Best audiobook player I've ever owned. Best money I've spent on my smart phone.

Daniel Christopher - December 30, 2011 - HTC Desire with version 2.13
Use it all the time, best audiobook player I have tried.

Will - November 7, 2011 - HTC Desire with version 2.13
Great
Great app absolutely nothing bad about it. However the linked market for new books is a little expensive.

Paul - November 8, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 2.13
Great
Thanks, works great for Librivox books

James - January 5, 2012 - HTC Evo 4G with version 2.13
Love it EVO 4 g. Can't get bluetooth to work

Grey - November 17, 2011 - HTC Thunderbolt with version 2.13
Grey
Excelent app. Bookmark feature is great.

Philip - March 28, 2012 - HTC Desire HD with version 2.13
Perfect for audio books
Keeps track of my audio books and keeps me sain on the train

emma - March 7, 2012 - LG Gelato with version 2.13
A
Needs a feature to increase narrator speed, other than that love it

Barry - April 11, 2012 - LG Optimus One with version 2.13
Very nice player
Ambling book player

tesliuk - January 27, 2012 - HTC Incredible S with version 2.13
Great app
Reliable, functional and intuitive app

Michael - March 8, 2012 - Droid Bionic with version 2.13
Love - but needs Speed
I agree with emma. I love this app, but I'm here looking for an app with that can increase the narrator speed for my non-Audible audiobooks.

Christopher - May 8, 2012 - LG Optimus 2X with version 2.13
Excellent
Best player for .mp3 audiobooks.

RBrewer - December 7, 2011 - Dell Streak with version 2.13
Love it!
My favorite audiobook player.

Tom - October 23, 2011 - Motorola Atrix with version 2.13
Good but too expensive.

Casey - March 1, 2012 - Samsung Dart with version 2.13
No wma
Support wma and I'd give 5 stars

Adnan - January 2, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 2.13
Working
It works now on galaxy nexus

Anthony - January 5, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 2.13
Cptamp
Great app!

J - April 28, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 2.13
Ok
Love the new widget.

December 16, 2011 - Samsung Exhibit 2 4G with version 2.13
Excellent
All the essentials and more

adavidaz - July 2, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Note with version 2.13
Perfection!!!
I've been listening to audiobooks since the late 80's. Just burned out my 3rd Zen mp3 player. Hesitated @ the price but after using Ambling I can absolutely say it is the Mac Daddy for audiobook enjoyment! Superb! Fantastic! Beautiful! Buy it!

October 7, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 2.12
Great app but...
They want to charge me 8 bucks to update even though I already bought it.

Karen - November 10, 2011 - HTC Droid Incredible with version 2.13
Great book player!
Love this app for long drives I truly enjoy using this app to listen to books while on long drives. Thanks!

Jeremy - October 10, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 2.12
Best audiobook player I have used on any platform including itunes!

Darrin - February 11, 2010 - HTC Evo 4G with version 2.12
Great app. I use it 8 hrs a day and its a huge upgrade ...
Great app. I use it 8 hrs a day and its a huge upgrade from the default media player. Worth the expense

padlrdie - March 16, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 2.12
Excellent app.
Just what I was looking for: an audio player designed for listening to speech. I sometimes download lectures, etc. from the webs and I needed a player with a button for backing up a few seconds, something music players just don't offer. This app is as close to perfect as I can imagine.

Dave Jackson - September 15, 2011 - Motorola Droid X2 with version 2.12
Best way to listen to books
Well thought out app that is worthy of support.

Andrew - October 3, 2011 - HTC Desire with version 2.12
Is this a joke? The process for listening to books on my SD card ...
Is this a joke? The process for listening to books on my SD card is outrageous!!! Uninstalled because life is too short :-(

Karen - October 22, 2011 - HTC Droid Incredible with version 2.12
Love this
Great. Has improved with updates

Sadegh - October 17, 2011 - Motorola Atrix with version 2.12
Love it!

KYDavidDoyle - October 5, 2011 - HTC Desire HD with version 2.12
Great!!

Andrea - September 13, 2011 - LGE Bryce with version 2.11
Excellent for road trips
I've only listened to some classics so far, but it's fabulous on long trips.

Kevin - September 6, 2011 - Motorola Droid X with version 2.11
Kevin
Like it. Blocky Interface and UI only thing stopping me from giving it 5 stars.

JD - September 2, 2011 - HTC Thunderbolt with version 2.11
Excellent!
I love the classic works and reader quality. Great app for the commuter.

Jim - August 31, 2011 - Motorola Droid X with version 2.11
Best audiobook player around

Ahmed - March 28, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 2.11
Amazing
This is simply a perfect audiobook player

John - September 15, 2011 - HTC Desire HD with version 2.10
A specialist audiobook player? This is the one you'll want. Costs little but works ...
A specialist audiobook player? This is the one you'll want. Costs little but works perfectly. Tried 3 or 4 others,but not as capable as pro version.

David - August 4, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 2.10
very good
A great way to listen to audiobooks. The interface is simple and intuitive, but highly customisable and with some well thought-out features. The amblingbooks store itself has a disappointly small selection, but the player works with most 3rd party formats too.

Crazy Irish - August 12, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 2.10
Works perfectly, and totally worth the price! Samsung vibrant.

Miss - March 16, 2011 - Version 2.08
It SUXXXX!!!!! I paid 8.99 and when i tried to get my money back ...
It SUXXXX!!!!! I paid 8.99 and when i tried to get my money back i just got some stupid message that i could reinstall this crap at no extra charge!!

June 18, 2011 - Sharp IS01 with version 2.08
This will be the best one for you if you add your audiobooks into ...
This will be the best one for you if you add your audiobooks into the libraly spending much time. I can't conroll it from bluetooth but still No. One.

Lye Nak - March 1, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy Tab with version 2.08
Many hours of pleasure listening to great stories with my daughter. Great bonding ...
Many hours of pleasure listening to great stories with my daughter. Great bonding time. Great app!

Pretty good. But after pause, restarts further back then where I set it to

Great concept, but lots of bugs with bookmarks not saving /loading correct ...
Great concept, but lots of bugs with bookmarks not saving /loading correct location. UPDATE: Better after load/save mp3 with goldwave

Marcus - May 22, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 2.08
Best book player on the market. Worth the $

Doug - June 14, 2011 - Motorola Droid X with version 2.08
It if this app had speed control it would be the BOMB!!!! Really great ...
It if this app had speed control it would be the BOMB!!!! Really great otherwise.

Heather - May 22, 2011 - Version 2.08
Good app overall, but doesn't restart at the same place I left off at. ...
Good app overall, but doesn't restart at the same place I left off at. Sometimes it goes back others forward. Frustrating.

kookopola - March 12, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 2.08
It really is rather good! Even better than the audible app!

Very functional, but a bit of a pain when i just want to listen ...

theresa - March 1, 2011 - HTC Desire with version 2.08

Great

This player is well worth the price , it does exactly what it claims ...
This player is well worth the price , it does exactly what it claims simple,fast,reliable

Todd - January 28, 2011 - Version 2.06
So tired of paying money for an app that works only to see it ...
So tired of paying money for an app that works only to see it updated to a useless piece of crap. I'm done wasting good money on any app. Uninstalled.

Tom - February 7, 2011 - Motorola Droid X with version 2.06
Outstanding app, works as advertised!

MARK BOVEN - January 26, 2011 - Version 2.06
Working great again with 2.06, hope to see playlist support (m3u, pls) soon!

James - January 22, 2011 - Version 2.06
If you like falling asleep to audiobooks, you'll love this app. Latest version is ...
If you like falling asleep to audiobooks, you'll love this app. Latest version is great. Galaxy S 2.2.1

The app didnt have the book i wanted so i uninstalled it 20 minutes ...

Omer - January 23, 2011 - Motorola Droid X with version 2.06
Great for audiobooks!

Robert - December 28, 2010 - HTC Droid Incredible with version 2.04
A decent audiobook player. Occasionally will start from the beginning of the book ...
A decent audiobook player. Occasionally will start from the beginning of the book but still show the hours and minutes that you are into it.

Michelle - December 12, 2010 - Motorola XOOM with version 2.04
This would be a great player except that I have to ff frequently to ...
This would be a great player except that I have to ff frequently to avoid hearing the same section of the book 3 times. Fix that and it gets 5 stars.

Trish - December 28, 2010 - Version 2.04
Loved it until the last update, now I can't get it to play at ...
Loved it until the last update, now I can't get it to play at all. Installed and reinstalled but still won't play?

bkw - January 3, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 2.04
The generic music player (EVO) plays unencrypted m4b from weread4you and ...
The generic music player (EVO) plays unencrypted m4b from weread4you and librivox. So why can't this supposedly all singing all dancing book player?

timcharper - November 24, 2010 - HTC G2 with version 2.03
Worth every penny! Well thought out and has all the features I care about

Tustin A - October 6, 2010 - Motorola Droid X with version 2.03
Excellent app! Great for books you convert from other formats.

Michael - December 31, 2010 - Motorola Droid with version 2.03
Most of the readings are good but sometimes you get that reader with a ...
Most of the readings are good but sometimes you get that reader with a really heavy accent that makes it hard to follow, otherwise I love it

Skid - November 23, 2010 - Version 2.03
Awesome app. I'm able to read books again despite my busy schedule!

Stephen - December 5, 2010 - HTC Evo 4G with version 2.03
This is a great app! Well worth the small fee. As good or better ...
This is a great app! Well worth the small fee. As good or better than my ipod.

Benny - November 23, 2010 - Version 2.03
Good reader. Would be 5 stars if book cover images didn't wind up in ...
Good reader. Would be 5 stars if book cover images didn't wind up in my photos folder. Fix please.

Ian - November 15, 2010 - Version 2.03
Excellent audiobook player well worth the money

Gail - December 17, 2010 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 2.03
Does the sleep timer HAVE to make a noise at the end of your ...

great podcast and audio book player

Was concerned about purchase due to some of the reviews based on the free ...
Was concerned about purchase due to some of the reviews based on the free version. I used I-touch but now my Droid Incredible has it all! Got the Pro.

Pro: Plays fine and remembers where you leave off. Works well with headphone controls. Con: Adding new books is more complicated than it needs to be.

A easier way to add files from SD card. Plugin audio jack should start the book only if other listening app didn't start beforehand (ie Listen).

Rather excellent app. I do wish to also have ability to add files from ...
Rather excellent app. I do wish to also have ability to add files from multiple folders to one book. Aside from that I love it.
